00027 /******************************************************************************
00028                                 Types section
00029  ******************************************************************************/
00030 /* Internal states of system timer. */
00031 typedef enum _SYS_TimerState_t
00032 {
00033   SYS_TIMER_STOPPED = 0x00,
00034   SYS_TIMER_STARTED = 0x01
00035 } SYS_TimerState_t;
00036 
00037 /* Type of the system timer. */
00038 typedef struct _SYS_Timer_t
00039 {
00040   SYS_TimerState_t state;
00041   HAL_AppTimer_t timer;
00042 } SYS_Timer_t;
00043 
00044 
00045 /******************************************************************************
00046                               Prototypes section
00047  ******************************************************************************/
00048 /******************************************************************************
00049   \brief Initialize the System Timer.
00050 
00051   \ingroup sys
00052   
00053   \param[in] sysTimer - timer pointer will be initialized.
00054   \param[in] mode - timer mode:  TIMER_ONE_SHOT_MODE or TIMER_REPEAT_MODE.
00055   \param[in] interval - timer interval (milliseconds).
00056   \param[in] handler - timer handler function pointer.
00057 
00058   \return None.
00059  *****************************************************************************/
00060 void SYS_InitTimer(SYS_Timer_t *const sysTimer, const TimerMode_t mode,
00061   const uint32_t interval, void (*handler)(void));
00062 
00063 /******************************************************************************
00064   \brief Start the HAL Application Timer.
00065 
00066   \ingroup sys
00067   
00068   \param[in] appTimer - timer pointer will be started.
00069   \return None.
00070  ******************************************************************************/
00071 void SYS_StartTimer(SYS_Timer_t *const sysTimer);
00072 
00073 /******************************************************************************
00074   \brief Stop the HAL Application Timer.
00075 
00076   \ingroup sys
00077   
00078   \param[in] appTimer - timer pointer will be stopped.
00079 
00080   \return None.
00081  *****************************************************************************/
00082 void SYS_StopTimer(SYS_Timer_t *const sysTimer);
